analysis.description:
VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#72-82) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! project_wallet.send(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#80-82)

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_remaining_funds_to_project (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#99-105) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! project_wallet.send(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol)

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#72-82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_funds_to_project (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#72-82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
VIUREFoundersTokenSale.transfer_remaining_funds_to_project (/unique_contracts/0x75a04712f6c2f3ca269e1ebf0fb5c8788884d5b9.sol#99-105) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
